faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Answered all frequently asked questions, Still confused? feel free contact with us

q1.question: What is Vyve?
q1.answer: Vyve is a platform that shows real-time occupancy and crowd information of cafes and venues in the city. It lets you see how busy a place is before you go.

q2.question: What information does Vyve provide?
q2.answer: Vyve provides venuesâ€™ real-time occupancy, crowd levels, and movement trends over time in a clear and simple way.

q3.question: How is this data collected?
q3.answer: Data is collected anonymously through people and movement tracking systems installed in venues and transmitted to Vyve in real time.

q4.question: Am I being watched by a camera?
q4.answer: No. Vyve does not use cameras, record video, or collect personal data. The system only generates counts and occupancy data.

q5.question: Is my personal data safe?
q5.answer: Yes. Vyve does not collect any personal information, identity data, or facial recognition data. All data is anonymous and presented as aggregated statistics.

q6.question: How up-to-date is the data?
q6.answer: The information in Vyve is real-time and updates within seconds, so you can see the latest status before visiting a venue.

q7.question: Are all venues on Vyve?
q7.answer: No. Only venues with Vyve systems installed and active data collection appear, ensuring the information is reliable.

q8.question: Why is a venue's occupancy sometimes not visible?
q8.answer: Sometimes a venue may be temporarily closed, data flow may pause briefly, or the system may be under maintenance. In such cases, occupancy data may be temporarily hidden.

q9.question: Is Vyve free to use?
q9.answer: Vyveâ€™s core features are free for users. Advanced features or special solutions may be offered in the future.

q10.question: How can businesses join Vyve?
q10.answer: Businesses can contact Vyve to install tracking systems, monitor their own venueâ€™s occupancy, and make it visible to users.

q11.question: What benefits does Vyve provide to businesses?
q11.answer: Vyve offers businesses real-time occupancy tracking, movement analysis by day and hour, customer behavior insights, and more efficient planning.

q12.question: In which cities is Vyve available?
q12.answer: Vyve operates in cities where the system is installed. New cities and venues are continuously added.

q13.question: Can occupancy data be incorrect?
q13.answer: The systems are highly accurate; however, sudden entries or exits may cause short-term deviations. Since data is continuously updated, this is quickly corrected.

q14.question: How can I start using Vyve?
q14.answer: You can start using Vyve via the mobile app by selecting your city, viewing venues, and checking occupancy before making a decision.
